ROM.Changelog:
==================== 05-22-2016 ====================
* frameworks/base/ 8f538de server: Whitelist non-INTERNET/non-CELLULAR Network for metering b61c012 keyguard: Fix password doesnot sanitize after verification 962bb1a Revert "SystemUI: recalculate clock position on removing empty shade views" 532e2a9 SystemUI: fix NPE when configuring blur layer

* packages/services/Telephony/ b1efa73 Automatic translation import
* vendor/aicp/ fa598b1 apns: Fix up AT&T APNs

==================== 05-20-2016 ====================
* frameworks/base/ ff3db8d Revert "SysUI: Fix coloring of battery drawables" 2c4db52 Release alarm wakelock for blocked uid. acd8922 SyncManager: Adjust sync remaining time calculation. c50b5d9 Themes: Fix theming of cmsdk assets 8544b15 Fix isComponentProtected calls in package manager tests 286a23d MSIM: Fix to resolve SIM PIN unlock in APM. 54cbd8a SystemUI: Check current data subscription when updating signal cluster fd9a9c3 SysUI: Fix coloring of battery drawables 7cb3cc4 SysUI: Adjust battery dimensions for better look 13b540b Fix Quick settings tiles font themes derp 049a576 am: Handle unchecked activity starts for protected components.
* frameworks/opt/net/ims/ adbcc1d IMS: Set the correct reason code for merged call 4f42880 IMS: Enhanced 4G LTE mode is turning off IMS. a973408 Add UT interface to query call forward setting for service class. 65d1461 IMS-VT: Update host call callProfile on conference success
* frameworks/opt/telephony/ ee21392 SubscriptionInfoUpdater: improved sim swap
* kernel/cyanogen/msm8916/ 75af017 radio: iris: Fix NULL pointer access
* packages/apps/Bluetooth/ 4e3379c Bluetooth: handle opening incoming APK files
* packages/apps/CarrierConfig/ 793e4b4 IMS: Enhanced 4G LTE mode is turning off IMS. 763c36a IMS-VT: Enable multi tasking based on MCC/MNC
* packages/apps/ContactsCommon/ 1d98744 Update LookupRequest to use the new ORIGIN codes within AmbientSDK
* packages/apps/Dialer/ c404307 Only schedule metrics job if not already scheduled 1f99dd1 Nudges: use unique id instead of packagename
* packages/apps/InCallUI/ bd76bbb Fix the extra-info container's overlap with dialpad
* packages/apps/Messaging/ 5cf15db Messaging: handle single sim MSIM device 9165168 Use new origin code in LookupRequest
* packages/apps/Settings/ 0c4edbf Settings: Fix Storage Applications Manager dropdown 5f80ff1 Settings: persist "always ask" sms sim selection 2faeb89 Settings : Add title to xml preference screens
==================== 05-19-2016 ====================
* device/cyanogen/msm8916-common/ 8ce5644 msm8916: Stop building libinit_msm

* kernel/cyanogen/msm8916/ 8d6dc61 ppp: take reference on channels netns 7658a1f netfilter: x_tables: check for size overflow f6972c8 ALSA: timer: Fix leak in events via snd_timer_user_tinterrupt 573bd26 ALSA: timer: Fix leak in events via snd_timer_user_ccallback 1cb7611 ALSA: timer: Fix leak in SNDRV_TIMER_IOCTL_PARAMS 2be021c Input: aiptek - fix crash on detecting device without endpoints 5b17da9 msm: vibrator: Add a sysfs node for the default (boot-up) level. 8fc8ec6 msm: vibrator: Properly unregister device files 8e3cfa8 msm: vibrator: Add min/max voltage sysfs entries 555d13f drivers: platform: msm: qpnp-vibrator: Add sysfs interface for intensity 1752b42 msm: Improve qpnp-vibrator scheduling

* packages/apps/Contacts/ 66374db Use the explicit spam flag on Contact for identifying spammy contacts
* packages/apps/ContactsCommon/ ee5aafb Extract spam information from encoded lookup-uri
* packages/apps/Dialer/ cc62ca7 Add spam information to encoded lookup uri f0b0af0 Revert "Show SIP call method in spinner and force update on resume" 9fb2bf7 Protecting against null locales

* platform_manifest/ a334bd8 manifest: Remove SpeechRecorder
* system/core/ 158dad2 init: Allow devices to opt-out of fsck'ing on power off
